author: Simon Difford
description: An equal parts riff on a Doctor No.1 using white wine acidity in place of lime juice. Tangy and slightly sharp in flavour with more than a hint of Swedish punch funkiness.
name: It's Hartnell Damn It!
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
